EmailTemplate.name: SSF: Contract Re-Sign
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Community Solar: Contract Resignature Needed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting an application and expressing interest in a BlueWave Community Solar subscription!
We have reviewed your application and one of the following occurred:
- Addition/Removal of a utility account - Typo in utility account number or application fields - Change in service address
To update the contract with the correct information, please click the link below and input your email address to sign the updated contract.
{!Lead.Contract_eSign_Link__c}
The link guides you to a contract where you check off boxes and agree to the terms of a community solar subscription. Once you input your email address, you have signed the contract and will receive a copy of the agreement in your inbox. Once enrolled to receive credits from a solar project, you will also receive a copy of the fully executed contract at the provided email address.
Let us know if you have any further questions and thank you for joining the BlueWave family!
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Support
